title: You’re Killing Me, Smalls
description: The KAJ get over ambitious when they set out to discuss, Space Jam, Little Giants and The Sandlot. Instead, they focus just on Sandlot, but first there’s Racquetball vs. Squash (9:09), A Pupdate (17:10), Official Pod Business (23:20), and then they get into The Sandlot (49:06). There are takes and they are hot!
itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
itunes:subtitle: The KAJ give you an in-depth discussion of The Sandlot! Among other things...
